units.name: Angron
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Samni’arius and Spinegrinder.

datasheet.name: Infectious Rage (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of this model, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. For the purposes of this ability, if a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, it is considered to be below its Starting Strength while it has lost one or more wounds.|Primarch||
000002621|9|||Righteous Slaughter (Aura)|While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.|Primarch||

units.name: Khârn The Betrayer
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Khârn’s plasma pistol; Gorechild.

datasheet.name: Legendary Killer
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: The Betrayer
datasheet.description: At the end of your Charge phase, if this model is leading a unit and that unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you must take a Leadership test for this model. If that test is failed, one Bodyguard model of your choice in that unit is destroyed.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Berzerker Frenzy
datasheet.description: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. It can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

units.name: Lord Invocatus
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Coward’s Bane, Juggernaut’s bladed horn.

core.name: Counter-attacks
core.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.
core.parameter: 000002623 | 4 | | | Counter-attacks | While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Road of Eight Bloody Steps
core.description: At the start of the battle, before any moves are made using the Scouts ability, you can select up to two friendly WORLD EATERS INFANTRY units within 6" of this model. Until the end of the battle, all models in the selected units have the Scouts 6" ability.
core.parameter: 000002623 | 5 | | | Road of Eight Bloody Steps | At the start of the battle, before any moves are made using the Scouts ability, you can select up to two friendly WORLD EATERS INFANTRY units within 6" of this model. Until the end of the battle, all models in the selected units have the Scouts 6" ability. | Datasheet | |

core.name: Infernal Fortitude (Aura)
core.description: While a friendly WORLD EATERS INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save, unless they already have a 5+ invulnerable save, in which case they have a 4+ invulnerable save.
core.parameter: 000002624 | 3 | | | Infernal Fortitude (Aura) | While a friendly WORLD EATERS INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save, unless they already have a 5+ invulnerable save, in which case they have a 4+ invulnerable save. | Datasheet | |

units.name: World Eaters Daemon Prince
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

datasheet.name: Devastating Assault
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, its hellforged weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Lord On Juggernaut
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: plasma pistol; exalted chainblade; Juggernaut’s bladed horn.

datasheet.name: Aggressive Advance
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll any or all of the following rolls made for that unit: Advance rolls; Charge rolls; Blood Surge rolls (see KHORNE BERZERKERS).|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Bloody Stampede
datasheet.description: Each time this model’s unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll one D6: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Master Of Executions
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; axe of dismemberment.

datasheet.name: Trophy Taker
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Murderous Swing
datasheet.description: Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Khorne Berzerkers
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Berzerker chainblade.

datasheet.name: Icon of Khorne
datasheet.description: Each time you make a Blessings of Khorne roll, if the bearer’s unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll one of the dice.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Blood Surge
datasheet.description: Each time an enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has finished making its attacks, if any models from this unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, this unit can make a Blood Surge move. To do so, roll one D6: this unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but this unit must finish that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. A unit cannot make a Blood Surge move while it is Battle-shocked.|Datasheet||

units.name: Jakhals
units.loadout: The Jakhal Pack Leader and every Jakhal is equipped with: autopistol; Jakhal chainblades. Every Dishonoured is equipped with: Dishonoured chainblades.

datasheet.name: Icon of Khorne
datasheet.description: Each time you make a Blessings of Khorne roll, if the bearer’s unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll one of the dice.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Objective Ravaged
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Terminator Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: combi-bolter; accursed weapon.

datasheet.name: Bloody Fury
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.|Datasheet||

units.name: Eightbound
units.loadout: The Eightbound Champion model is equipped with: lacerators. Every Eightbound model is equipped with: Eightbound eviscerators.

core.name: Beacons of Rage (Aura)
core.description: While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.
core.parameter: 000002630 | 3 | | | Beacons of Rage (Aura) | While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead. | Datasheet | |

units.name: Exalted Eightbound
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Eightbound eviscerator; Eightbound chainfist.

datasheet.name: Overwhelming Wrath (Aura)
datasheet.description:
Each time an enemy unit within 6" of this unit is selected to Fall Back, that unit must take a Leadership test. If that test is failed, that unit must Remain Stationary this phase instead.|Datasheet||

000002632|3|||Frenzy|Each time an enemy unit targets this model, after that unit has finished making its attacks, this model can either shoot as if it were your Shooting phase or fight as if it were the Fight phase.|Datasheet||
000002632|4|||Helbrute Fists|If this model is equipped with two Helbrute fists, those weapons have the [TWIN-LINKED] ability.|Datasheet||

000002634|3|||Assault Ramp|Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Helbrute
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: missile launcher; multi-melta; close combat weapon.

units.name: World Eaters Chaos Spawn
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: hideous mutations.

units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 soulshatter lascannons; twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

units.name: World Eaters Predator Destructor
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Predator autocannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Destructor
datasheet.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model targets an enemy INFANTRY unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Predator Annihilator
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Predator twin lascannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Annihilator
datasheet.description: Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Forgefiend
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 Hades autocannons; 1 Forgefiend jaws.

datasheet.name: Furious Onslaught
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has finished making its attacks, if one or more of those attacks scored a hit against an enemy INFANTRY unit, that INFANTRY unit must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Maulerfiend
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: lasher tendrils; Maulerfiend fists.

datasheet.name: The Scent of Blood
datasheet.description: Each time you make a Charge roll for this model, if one or more of the targets of that charge are below their Starting Strength, add 2 to that roll. Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Rhino
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: combi-bolter; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Self Repair
datasheet.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Heldrake
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Hades autocannon; Heldrake claws.

datasheet.name: Swooping Predator
datasheet.description: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit that it moved over during that move and roll two D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

units.name: Khorne Lord Of Skulls
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: gorestorm cannon; Hades gatling cannon; great cleaver of Khorne.

datasheet.name: Blessed Slaughter
datasheet.description: Each time you make a Blessings of Khorne roll, for each enemy unit destroyed by this model in the previous battle round, you can add 1 to or subtract 1 from one of the dice rolled (each dice can only be modified in this way once, and a dice cannot be modified below 1 or above 6).|Datasheet||

units.name: World Eaters Daemon Prince With Wings
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons.

profiles.name: World Eaters Daemon Prince With Wings

datasheet.name: Bloodied Terror
datasheet.description: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Oath to Khorne
datasheet.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army to be this model’s sworn foe. Each time this model makes an attack that targets that sworn foe, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll. If, at the end of the battle, that sworn foe has not been destroyed, this model is destroyed.|Datasheet||

units.name: Blood Slaughterer
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: impaler harpoon; slaughter blade.

datasheet.name: Scuttling Gait
datasheet.description:
Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.|Datasheet||

units.name: Terrax-pattern Termite
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Terrax melta cutter; 2 combi-bolters; Termite drill.

datasheet.name: Termite Assault
datasheet.description:
This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the maximum number of Reserves units you can start the battle with. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your first, second or third Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model can disembark after it has been set up on the battlefield, and if they do they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Line-breaker
datasheet.description: When making ranged attacks, this model can target enemy units within Engagement Range of it with Blast weapons (provided no other friendly units are also within Engagement Range of that enemy unit). In addition, when making ranged attacks, this model does not suffer the penalty to its Hit rolls for being within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Rolling Fortress

units.name: Relic Contemptor Dreadnought
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy plasma cannons; armoured feet.

datasheet.name: Even In Death I Serve
datasheet.description: The first time this model is destroyed, remove it from play without resolving its Deadly Demise ability. Then, at the end of the phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with D6 wounds remaining.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Conversion
datasheet.description:
Each time an attack made with this weapon targets a unit more than 12" from the bearer, an unmodified successful Hit roll of 4+ scores a Critical Hit.|Wargear profile||
